moves.1. e4: This is my traditional move where by i attempt to make a quick win by going for f 7......I admit it only works on weak opponents......so i use this opening to size up my opponent and see what i am up against
moves.1... c5: I see no threat yet so i continue with my initial plan
moves.2... e6: Now  i know my opponent is not a beginner
moves.3. d3: Now that i know my opponent is not an amateur, I begin to release my pieces, i have nothinng in mind yet
moves.3... Nc6: well I continue releasing my pieces from the back line
moves.5. Nc3: planning to keep pushing pieces until opponent makes first error
moves.5... d5: I m not sure of his intentions yet so i just wait
moves.6. exd5: I eliminated the pawn on d5 because I want to keep that white diagonal open for my bishop n c4
moves.6... exd5 7. Bb5: Wekk I have to keep the bishop safe
moves.7... Bg4 8. Bxc6+: I took this opportunity to trade 3 points for 3 but i forced him to have two pawns in the same line.......It feels like an advantage of some sort
moves.8... bxc6 9. h3: Well I should have defended square g4 a long time back
moves.9... Qe7+ 10. Kd2: With this move I am trying to keep a straight path to his Q and King....to try an get his Queen
moves.10... d4 11. Re1: I am trying to get that Q
moves.11... Be6: I was too greedy, I should have taken that Bishop
moves.12. Ng5: My plan still has not changed at this moment
moves.12... g6 13. Re2: I need more pieces to attack E6 so i am creating the space for my Q to support rook
moves.13... Bh6 14. f4 dxc3+ 15. bxc3: I have no choice but to eliminate the pawn in d3
moves.15... Bg7: I dont understand why he made that particular move
moves.16. Qe1 Nd5: oh I see what he is up to...he wants to capture my Q by attacking C3 with his bishop
moves.17. Bb2: I just have to defend and continue with my assault on E6
moves.17... Nxf4: Just keep the pressure on E6
moves.18. Re4: Just keep the pressure on E6
moves.18... Nxg2: He is trying to force me to reduce my pressure on E6
moves.19. Qe2: But I wont, Now his knight is up for grabs
moves.19... Qxg5+: Actually my knight was up for grabs.....I didn't see that one...I guess i have to improve my concentration
moves.20. Kd1 O-O: now I am so under attack...I have to reorganise my defence
moves.21. Rb1 Bxh3: I am not sure of his plan.....so i just play along
moves.22... Bxc3 23. Bxc5: I made this blunder and m happy he missed it
moves.23... Rfd8 24. Rb7: this was a blunder too because my Bishop is still in danger.......but I did not see it at the time
moves.24... Rab8: obvious move i have to trade
moves.25. Rxb8: obvious move i have to trade
moves.25... Rxb8 26. Re8+: Now I have a chance to get something big here
moves.26... Rxe8: I have to get that rook
moves.27. Qxe8+: I have to get that rook, its the only logical thing to do,
